## type

[src/components/D3Graph.js:32-32](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/44c94089c3f8c06ba41c81b01cec664fa92564ef/src/components/D3Graph.js#L32-L32 "Source code on GitHub")

对应到绘制的类的名字

## option

[src/components/D3Graph.js:36-36](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/44c94089c3f8c06ba41c81b01cec664fa92564ef/src/components/D3Graph.js#L36-L36 "Source code on GitHub")

目前包含两个主要属性就是`attrs`和`text`,`text`是指svg中的嵌套内容,`attrs`是对应到svg元素的attributes,以后可能还会扩展其他属性(svg的标准)

## actionTypeEnums

action枚举

**Properties**

-   `draw` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 绘画
-   `redraw` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 重绘/更新
-   `select` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 选择
-   `unselect` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 反选
-   `delete` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 删除
-   `clear` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 清除所有图形
-   `undo` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 撤销
-   `data` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 数据操作
-   `input` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** 用户输入操作

## fromDrawing

## fromActions

[src/components/D3Graph.js:173-190](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/44c94089c3f8c06ba41c81b01cec664fa92564ef/src/components/D3Graph.js#L173-L190 "Source code on GitHub")

反序列化actions

**Parameters**

-   `actions` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)&lt;[ActionOptionType](#actionoptiontype)>** 

**Examples**

```javascript
const actions=fromActions([{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"LineDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"line1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
},{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"DotDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"dot1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
}])
```

## DrawAction

[src/components/D3Graph.js:234-238](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/44c94089c3f8c06ba41c81b01cec664fa92564ef/src/components/D3Graph.js#L234-L238 "Source code on GitHub")

**Extends Action**

绘图action

**Parameters**

-   `drawingOps`  
-   `ops`  

**Examples**

```javascript
<D3Graph actions={[
	new DrawAction(new LineDrawing({id:"line1",attrs:{x1:0,y1:0,x2:100,y2:100}})),
	new DrawAction(new DotAction({id:"dot1",attrs:{cx:100,cy:100}}))
]}/>
```

### constructor

[src/components/D3Graph.js:1130-1173](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/44c94089c3f8c06ba41c81b01cec664fa92564ef/src/components/D3Graph.js#L1130-L1173 "Source code on GitHub")

**Parameters**

-   `option` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 绘制的选项
    -   `option.circleAttrs` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 圆圈的属性
    -   `option.circleSelectedAttrs` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 圆圈选中的属性
    -   `option.textAttrs` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 文本的属性
    -   `option.textSelectedAttrs` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 文本选中的属性
    -   `option.text` **[String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)**

### propTypes

[src/components/D3Graph.js:1529-1564](https://github.com/m860/opserarch-drawing/blob/44c94089c3f8c06ba41c81b01cec664fa92564ef/src/components/D3Graph.js#L1529-L1564 "Source code on GitHub")

**Properties**

-   `attrs` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** svg的属性
-   `actions` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** 所有的操作
-   `selectMode` **(single | multiple)** [single] - 选择模式,是多选还是单选
-   `original` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 坐标原点,默认值{x:0,y:0}
-   `coordinateType` **([screen](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Guide/Mobile) \| [math](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math))** 坐标系,默认值是屏幕坐标系
-   `mode` **(none | playing)** 模式,默认是:none,如果是playing,则是样式模式,会一步一步的演示绘图过程
-   `playingOption` **[object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** mode===playing时有效
-   `renderToolbar` **[Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)** 绘图的工具栏
-   `scale` **[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** 缩放比例,默认是1(1个单位对应一个像素)
